SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: The Marvelous Story of Ethereum vs Ethereum Classic and Their Comparison
data.baseline: Ethereum and Ethereum Classic are two distinct platforms, each with its own set of values. The philosophy of the camps behind them is what steers the direction of their development.

data.title: Walkthrough Overview of Security Token Offerings
data.baseline: Security token offerings (STOs) are widely regarded as an efficient means of raising capital. They bring regulation to blockchain-enabled crowdfunding and offer multiple benefits to investors.

data.title: Overview of Amazon Managed Blockchain and Its Success Stories
data.baseline: With blockchain gaining ground across a wide range of industries, it’s no surprise that Amazon hopped on the bandwagon and introduced its own AWS blockchain, making it easy for users to create and manage scalable blockchain networks within the AWS console.

preview320.title: blockchain-in-government-processes-main-1600
preview320.alt: People next to government buildings and grey cubes

data.title: How Blockchain Contributes to the Transformation of Government Processes
data.baseline: Blockchain and government may seem like an incompatible combination at first glance. However, together they can address key issues such as lack of digitalization and transparency, privacy concerns, inefficiencies, and many more. But how?

data.title: Top Blockchain Projects, Platforms, Companies 2021
data.baseline: Having blockchain in a project’s technology stack is no longer a novelty. To really impress, you now have to prove that it does bring substantial value and benefits.

preview320.title: celebrities-join-nft-craze-main-1600
preview320.alt: A celebrity on a red carpet answering journalists' questions

data.title: How and Why Celebrities and Influencers Are Joining the NFT Craze
data.baseline: Until recently, tech-savvies and crypto enthusiasts were watching the price of Bitcoin with bated breath and passionately discussing cryptocurrencies. Now NFTs, another blockchain-related phenomenon, have come to steal the show.

preview500.alt: People opening up gift boxes on a decentralized network background

preview320.title: what-is-a-decentralized-exchange-dex-main-1600
preview320.alt: People opening up gift boxes on a decentralized network background

data.title: What’s Special About Decentralized Exchanges?
data.baseline: Decentralized exchanges (DEXs) are among the most promising blockchain use cases. They open up opportunities to securely buy and sell cryptocurrency without the user having to hand over assets to a third party.

preview.title: azure-blockchain-service-and-migration-main-1600
preview.alt: People operating digital devices next to Azure Blockchain inscription

preview768.alt: People operating digital devices next to Azure Blockchain inscription

preview500.title: azure-blockchain-service-and-migration-main-1600
preview500.alt: People operating digital devices next to Azure Blockchain inscription

preview320.title: azure-blockchain-service-and-migration-main-1600
preview320.alt: People operating digital devices next to Azure Blockchain inscription

data.title: Retired Azure Blockchain Service Overview and How to Migrate
data.baseline: Blockchain-as-a-service (BaaS) adds value to businesses by giving them a fast, easy way to spin off new blockchain networks and take advantage of cloud managed services. Microsoft’s Azure BaaS powered many decentralized applications and gave birth to promising blockchain startups. Now that it’s shutting down, a smooth migration is what’s on the mind of most dApp owners.
